title: Passion Of Mind  - Very Rare DVD Copy -- Spanish Subtitles
description:
Passion of Mind

                      
                Previously not uploaded to the Internet

      
      WINRAR&#039;ed File. Contains Passion of Mind.avi and Passion of         

                      Mind.srt (spanish subtitles)


When Marie, a widow in Provence with two daughters,
locks her bedroom door and goes to sleep, she dreams
about Marty, a literary agent in Manhattan
who dreams equally vividly about Marie.

The women look alike. Marie meets William who begins
to court her. Marty meets Aaron, an accountant,
becomes his friend and then his lover.

Both women tell their lovers about their dream life.
William is jealous, Aaron is accepting.

Even though they&#039;ve become lovers, Marie won&#039;t fall
asleep next to William. Marie goes on holiday with
William to Paris, and Marty wakes up with an
ashtray from the hotel on her night stand.
